t: Amazon Fire TV 65“ Omni Series smart TV
Amazon makes its own TVs now, and one responds to 'Alexa' hands-free - CNET
s: September 10, 2021 - In a nod toward the ubiquity of video chat, the Fire TV Omni will be the first smart TV with built-in Zoom (the second-generation Fire TV Cube also supports Zoom). To use it you'll need to connect an optional USB webcam to the TV. Zoom launches on the Omni TV "later this year," according to Amazon.

t: Amazon Has Unveiled Its First Own-Brand TVs - Leaving Rivals With Plenty To Think About
s: September 13, 2021 - And just to be clear, these really are fully fledged TVs, with screens, connections and everything, rather than just new variants of the external streaming boxes and sticks the brand has done so well with over recent years. The more expensive Amazon Omni range will be available in the US from ...

t: Amazon Making Its Own Fire TVs | 4-Series & Omni Series - Consumer Reports
s: Consumer Reports shares details of the new Amazon Fire TVs, which Amazon is making. The new 4-Series and Omni Series TVs will be available exclusively at Amazon and Best Buy.
